summary: Completed comprehensive testing of StudyQuest multi-user quiz system. Backend APIs are 100% functional. Frontend user flows work correctly with proper authentication, quiz functionality, and leaderboard system.

integration_issues.issue: Occasional timeout when accessing leaderboard after extended testing sessions

passed_tests: User registration with unique email/username validation
Dashboard displays user-specific stats (XP, level, quizzes, average score)
Topics page displays available quizzes with proper metadata
Quiz taking functionality with working timer
Quiz submission and accurate score calculation
Badge awarding system (Perfectionist, Quiz Master, Speed Demon)
User stats update after quiz completion
Multiple user registration and separate dashboards
Proper error handling for invalid credentials
All backend API endpoints (26/26 tests passed)
